name: Spinshot Party
description:
Join the excitement of a real-life table football game! This game is easy to learn, but challenging to master, making it perfect for players of all skill levels. The intuitive controls will test your hand-eye coordination and finger dexterity. It's a family-friendly game that's sure to liven up any party.

The game can be played with just one controller by sharing with a partner. For the best experience, it is recommended to have at least two Controllers. You can use Steam Remote play to play with up to three friends online. Get ready to show off your table football skills!
